name: Puzzle Dungeon 2.0
description:
Move the player with WASD keys, and interact with objects with SPACE. Figure out how to clear the path and find the exit!

This is a rushed prototype developed while learning Godot. It currently only contains 5 simple levels, meant to work as a tutorial of how the game works. I hope I will eventually make a proper game out of it!

Most sprites used are from TinyTales.

You can either play the game on the browser, or download the executable and run it (for windows)
